name: Aviation Safety and Training Pte Ltd
about: Aviation Safety and Training Pte Ltd is a high-technology-based training solutions provider specializing in aviation training services for commercial aircraft pilots and aircrew. Incorporated in 2011 and registered as a Private Limited Company in Singapore, the company has been operating for over 13 years. Located at 15 Changi Business Park Crescent, HAITE Building, Singapore, it offers advanced training solutions utilizing cutting-edge technology. With a strong focus on safety and compliance, the company is accredited and operates in accordance with stringent industry standards. Aviation Safety and Training Pte Ltd is committed to delivering top-quality training to ensure the highest levels of aviation safety and proficiency.
services:
["A320 Type Rating
A320 Reactivation
Jet Orientation
Recurrent / Refresher Program"]
